DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine vitamin A equivalent high-carotenoid variety cassava .
DOC.brief_title: Vitamin A Absorption From Cassava Women
DOC.detailed_description: We plan conduct single site intervention phase II intervention study healthy adult woman . Women serve control , feed three treatment random order : single meal low-carotenoid cassava porridge fat , similar meal bio-fortified cassava ( high vitamin A-forming carotenoid ) fat , similar meal bio-fortified cassava without fat . Carotenoids vitamin A measure triacylglycerol-rich lipoprotein ( TRL ) fraction plasma standard method involve ultracentrifugation ( concentrate TRL fraction ) follow reversed-phase HPLC use electrochemical detection . We plan collect sufficient data identify time first appearance peak concentration retinol , retinyl ester , alpha-carotene ( AC ) , beta-carotene ( BC ) , beta-carotene isomer ( BCI ) , cryptoxanthin ( CX ) TRL : single meal contain moderately high amount carotenoid bio-fortified cassava feed healthy adult woman . We use data determine vitamin A equivalency bio-fortified cassava adult woman , effect fat vitamin A equivalency bio-fortified cassava .
DOC.criteria: nonsmoking BMI 1830 total cholesterol concentration 90 225 mg/dL blood pressure 140/90 mm Hg hemoglobin 11.5 g/dL blood chemistry within normal range must pregnant try get pregnant must take fat , triacylglycerol , cholesterol lower medication ) orlistat , gemfibrozil , niacin , lovastatin , simvastatin , colestipol , ezetimibe ) must take medicine contain high dos retinoids Accutane high vitamin A carotenoid supplement must blood chemistry health history result consistent acute cancer heart disease obvious psychological sociological problem alcoholism , drug abuse , severe acute mental illness would influence ability sign inform consent agreement participate study duty activity must allergic cassava , peanut , peanut oil
